item.title: Chaos Engineering with Chaos Mesh® and Linkerd. DevCon, China
item.description:
DevCon2021 asian conference presented my pre-recorded talk about a quick Chaos Engineering introduction using Chaos Mesh and Linkerd. Online event.

item.title: Covid Realtime Visualizer with K8s, Linkerd & Chaos Mesh. KCD, Spain
item.description:
I spoke with my students in the KCD Spain with the topic Realtime COVID-19 Vaccinated People Visualizer, this project was build using Kubernetes, Chaos Mesh, Linkerd, Strimzi, and gRPC. Online event.

Event Link | Slides | Demo Repository

item.title: Creating Chaos in the University with Linkerd and Chaos Mesh. ServiceMeshConEU, Amsterdam
item.description:
I spoke at ServiceMeshConEU 2021 with Jossie Castrillo about Chaos Engineering using Chaos Mesh and Linkerd. Online event.
